title: The Greatest Thing in the World and Other Addresses
creator: Henry Drummond
description: LibriVox recording of The Greatest Thing in the World and Other Addresses, by Henry Drummond. Read by Pattymarie. The spiritual classic The Greatest Thing In the World is a trenchant and tender analysis of Christian love as set forth in the thirteenth chapter of I Corinthians. The other addresses speak to other aspects of Christian life and thought. (Summary by Pattymarie) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: Religion; Christianity; philosophy; Christian love; essay; Librivox; audiobook
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
